I got a extra large expecting it to be a bit bigger then a large. At least reaching to my thumb but no it's fits like a large and tge sleeves are short and it's not really comfortable.
I ordered this for my daughter, because she really wanted it, and the quality of the material is great and looks just like the picture. Would recommend to order.
My daughter loves it. She loves everything about it. True to size.
My daughter loves it, like that it is quality and as described.

Grandaughter loves it and it looks good on her!

Had this hoodie for less than week and it starts look like Chewbacca after not using conditioner for a month. Super sad cuz i really like the style and how it fits. I tried to do all the diy fix stuff on it to try and get rid of the shedding but I don't want to tear a hole in it, and i can't really deal with a dramatic crying episode right now.

My 11 year old picked this out for fall. She is 5'1 and 120 pounds and this is slightly baggy on her like she wanted. It's soft and she doesn't wear anything if it's at all uncomfortable so I highly recommend this jacket.

I really like this jacket, its my new favorite. One thing is the grey looks way darker in the image then when you actually get it. It’s definitely more of a light grey irl. other than that, its very good. I love the patches. Very warm.

Overall not great, bought this for myself not to long ago and before even opening it I could tell it was off from the pic, the material looks way different and just terrible quality overall, it's very thick, kind of a shiny material , and very stiff in a way, not very comfortable to be in general. Definitely not like the advertisement.
Worse materials and the hoodie was badly made.
